Installation

Source: vignettes/pages/installation.Rmd
installation.Rmd

MuSiC is implemented as an R package, MuSiC, which can be installed from GitHub by:

# install devtools if necessary
install.packages('devtools')

# install bseqsc
devtools::install_github('xuranw/MuSiC')

# load
library(MuSiC)

Developed by Xuran Wang.

Site built with pkgdown.
